content:
Who would have thought that a simple "good morning"
Could evolve into a delightful weekend afternoon tea gathering!
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Why do you all make such strange faces
when you hear about me making breakfast?
...I'll have you know I can cook too, Bhan!
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
It's wonderful to see you now,
And your daily routine,
Which is, by general standards, regular and healthy.
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Why would anyone venture out
to frolic in the mortal realm so early?
The night, after all, is when revelry should truly begin!
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
You see, after greeting the neighbors, one naturally falls into conversation,
which naturally leads to discussing new interests,
which naturally leads to making plans together...
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Last night, I crafted a black mask
to represent a character of martial prowess.
However, I forgot to leave openings for the eyes and teeth,
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
The aroma of freshly brewed coffee and a warm breakfast are essential for a clear mind. (Yawn) 
Good morning, my friend, a busy new day is starting.
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Replace mechanical alarm sounds with birdsong and cricket chirps,
Let happiness begin with nature's gentle wake-up call,
Would you like me to show you how to change your ringtone, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>?
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Every morning, my alarm clock would play a waltz.
(Dejected) Every morning, that is... until it broke.
So lately, I've been having trouble getting up.
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Yee~ Good morning, dear park visitors!
Oh, don't ask about my plans for today,
As a whimsical scholar, I specialize in "impromptu performances."
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
I've just finished my commission.
Oh, for you, it's quite early,
But for me, it's rather late.
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
The most important part of waking up early is having a full meal.
A full stomach and some exercise leads to strength—
<size=64>Hiyah—</size>
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Yip~ It's lovely to see you this morning!
What a splendid day indeed.
Where shall we venture next, bhan?
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
I wonder if you've just woken up, or haven't slept at all,
But it's wonderful to encounter you here.
Oh, I should say, "Good morning."
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
It's not because,
I only just figured out,
where I woke up...
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
In the last world bubble where I lingered,
Every morning I could hear the breakfast vendors calling from the alley,
It's been so long since I've heard it... I find myself missing it sometimes.
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Here's what I've learned lately:
Taking time to greet everything around you each day
Can make quite a difference.
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Yee~ Good morning, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>!
I heard visitors' voices in my dream earlier,
So I had to stop my lovely dream. Still feeling sleepy...

content:
Good morning! Have you had breakfast yet?
Would you like to try my cooking next time?

content:
Using a kip-up as my morning wake-up move~
It shakes the drowsiness right out of my head, achieving instant alertness!

content:

greeting our friends properly each day
can make quite a difference.

content:
I feel most prosperous right when I wake up,
Then reality sets in as I brush my hair...
Oh, the agony of losing hair hurts more than losing money!
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
You see, after greeting the neighbors, we naturally start chatting,
and then somehow the conversation turns to new interests,
and before you know it, we're making plans to meet...

content:
The Lu family motto is "early to bed, early to rise makes one healthy,"
and I've been following it diligently!
<size=30>Though only the "early to rise" part.</size>
